paper_abstract: We introduce a new manifold-based construction for fitting a smooth surface to a triangle mesh of arbitrary topology. our construction combines in novel ways most of the best features of previous constructions and, thus, it fills the gap left by them. We also introduce a theoretical framework that provides a sound justification for the correctness of our construction. Finally, we demonstrate the effectiveness of our manifold-based construction with a few concrete examples. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A new construction of smooth surfaces from triangle meshes using parametric pseudo-manifolds
